description: Number of orbits of length n in map whose periodic points are A048578.
references: Yash Puri and Thomas Ward, A dynamical property unique to the Lucas sequence, Fibonacci Quarterly, Volume 39, Number 5 (November 2001), pp. 398-402.
links: Y. Puri and T. Ward, Arithmetic and growth of periodic orbits, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 4 (2001), #01.2.1.
formula: If b(n) is the n-th term of A048578, then a(n)=(1/n)* Sum_{d|n}\mu(d)a(n/d)
example: a(3)=2 since the 3rd term of A048578 is 9 and the first term is 3.
crossrefs: Cf. A001037, A059966 (both nearly identical to this sequence).
author: Thomas Ward (t.ward(AT)uea.ac.uk)
